OrgName: Kingston Technology Company, Inc./ Kingston Digital, Inc.
activities:
Customers of Kingston Technology Company, Inc./ Kingston Digital, Inc.(“Kingston”) purchase or e-services, request information, register their product or themselves as customers subscribe to newsletters, receipt of marketing materials, and/or minimally required personal data to complete the transaction.
Kingston will also collect, transfer and use employee data for purposes of employee benefits and services. Benefits and services include evaluation of qualifications for employment, provision of employment benefits, reporting, security management, performance management and training, budgeting and salary administration related management, and workforce management, business contact directory, company network access, authentication and personalization.
contactoff1: Kingston Technology Company, Inc. / Kingston Digital, Inc.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
personaldata: On-line / Offline: Customers and Human resources data
privacyprograms:
1. PCI DSS Self Assessment Compliance - submit Attestation of Compliance Annually
2. ISO/IEC 27001 Certified - Audit by third party annually
